title: Contrast
notes: Solid 60 FPS in the beginning areas. Game was not tested further. No bugs to report.

title: Contrast
notes: Technically stable, but bad performance compared to my traditional (manual) Wine setup, with fps in the 30s/40s

title: Contrast
notes: Looks like it could run smoothly, but has "heartbeat stutter" making it uncomfortable to play :(.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.4-steamvr-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Has some stutters, with 30-50fps. Still easily playable. Play the first few levels.
title: Contrast

notes: At first start, warns about not recognizing GPU and defaults to lowest presets. Runs fine at high detail, apart from some stuttering when loading new areas.
title: Contrast

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Game can't detect GPU right so starts with low res and low detail. These can be increased from game settings normally so it's not an issue. Performance is not optimal, but mostly around 50-60fps at 1440p and graphics settings maxed. Certainly playable and seems to be stable. Everything works including Xbox 360 controller.
title: Contrast

notes: Played through the whole game and didn't experience any problems.
title: Contrast
